body.name: Adaptedfor O-CEDA EasyWring Microfiber Spin Mop Replacement Set - Adjustable Handle, Baser, Spin Mop Head,2 Microfiber Mop Refills,1 Triangle Mop Head Cover and 30-58in Mop Handle Set Combo(White) (2)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 2 mins
features: Complete Set: This kit includes a rotating mop head, mop base, and mop handle, along with 2 microfiber mop refills and 1 round triangular mop head cover. The mop handle kit is adjustable from 30 to 58 inches and is designed to be compatible with the O-CEDA EasyWring Microfiber Spin Mop.

Adjustable Mop Handle: The mop handle consists of four parts, allowing easy height adjustment from 30 inches to 58 inches. Whether you're short, tall, or extra tall, you can effortlessly adjust the height to fit your cleaning needs.

Triangular Mop Head Cover: The mop head cover is equipped with a round triangular design, preventing the mop from damaging furniture during cleaning. It is easy to install and durable, providing added protection for your furniture and a smooth cleaning experience.

Premium Microfiber Material: The mop refills are made of 100% microfiber, making them highly effective at cleaning dirt and dust on smooth surface floors like hardwood, ceramic tiles, laminate, marble, and glass windows. They are also durable and machine-washable, ensuring long-lasting use.

Versatile and Efficient: This kit offers a range of functions suitable for various cleaning tasks and floor surfaces. Whether for home or office use, you can easily achieve effective floor cleaning, keeping your living space spotless and tidy.

"Ultimate Cleaning Kit:Adaptedfor O-CEDA EasyWring Microfiber Spin Mop Replacement Set - Adjustable Handle, Baser, Spin Mop Head，2 Microfiber Mop Refills, 1 Triangle Mop Head Cover and 30-58in Mop Handle Set Combo， NOTE: The repalcement parts only compatible with Ocedar 1-Tank system, NOT compatible with O cedar 2-Tanks RinseClean system.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Descriptions Super Saver Spin Mop Set It contains 2 Spin Mop Replacement Heads, 4 Section Spin Mop Replacement Handles and 1 Mop Base.

100% Microfiber Spin mop replacement head is made of 100% microfiber, the material is soft and clean, easy to clean dirt and dust, will not scratch the floor, better cleaning results.These mop replacement heads are made of microfiber material for higher density and better quality. It is super absorbent and brings you a streak-free floor. Mop Base It is made of high quality plasticLightweight、reusability and durableFor 1 Tank SystemEasy to install and removeReaches into corners and under furniture Mop Replacement Handle Made of sturdy stainless steel material, it is stronger and sturdier for deep cleaning.Easy to rotate, just release the mop and step on the foot pedal to activate the wringer.The 30-58 inch mop handle mop stick comes with 4 sections, perfect for both tall and short people.

Push Pedal to Wring Unlike traditional mop buckets, it is ideal for mopping all hard floor surfaces without having to bend over or get your hands wet. Splash Guard Effectively prevents water from splashing and spraying outside the mop bucket when mopping. Hands-Free Simply use the built-in foot pedal for hands-free wringing.

Reusable Mop Head This value pack contains 2 refills and each microfiber refill lasts up to 3 months! Save time and money with longer lasting mop head replacements. Superfine Microfiber Our replacement mop heads are made of microfiber, which is highly absorbent and cleans dirt quickly and efficiently! Machine Washable This microfiber mop head is machine washable and reusable. We recommend replacing the mop head refill every 3 months for optimal floor cleaning. Applicable to Various Floors This microfiber swivel mop refill safely and effectively cleans stains on hard surface floors, including hardwood, laminate, tile, vinyl, linoleum and more.

Brand Promise Enjoy a fast and fun floor cleaning experience with the EasyWring Spin Mop, a foot pedal spinning mop design that allows for hands-free wringing for improved cleaning efficiency.We are committed to providing healthy, effective and safe products for your entire family. We will continue to strive to be your trusted cleaning partner and never let you down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The handle is so sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because the original handle on my spin mop rusted and broke. This mop handle has been absolutely amazing and it came with two refills which I really needed. The price point was good, and I use it almost daily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My original O Cedar mop head broke. I purchased this one as a replacement, as it was cheaper than to buy a whole new one. I found it very easy to assemble works great, and this handle is longer than the original so I don’t have to bend over while mopping. Much more sturdy than the original as well. Highly recommend this product. The replacement heads that come with this car also much more fluffy and thick than the original. O cedar, spin mop heads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Replacement heads and stick
reviews.reviewText: It was much better than the original one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the original
reviews.reviewText: This mop was very comfortable to handle. I had to bend a lot with the original but this one is longer and therefore less bending to mop. The material seems sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saved me buying a whole new mop system
reviews.reviewText: Well my original mop broke so I thought I would try just getting a new mop . This works perfect with my old mop pan. Saved some money and that makes me happy in these days of inflation.

reviews.reviewText: sturdy and alot longer than the original one. Works great in the spinney bucket!

reviews.reviewText: I like the options to change the height of the sturdy pole. Yet, the pole is lightweight enough to wash walls.

reviews.reviewText: Well made and was nice to only replace head but also get extra mop heads at a good value! Arrived on time.
